nl.taico.tekkitrestrict.gui.lib

Class JSuggestField

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.text.JTextComponent
            • javax.swing.JTextField
              • nl.taico.tekkitrestrict.gui.lib.JSuggestField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class JSuggestField
extends javax.swing.JTextField
    Provides a text-field that makes suggestions using a provided data-vector. You might have seen this on Google (tm), this is the Java implementation.
    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    David von Ah
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void setSuggestMatcher(SuggestMatcher suggestMatcher)
        Determine how the suggestions are generated. Default is the simple ContainsMatcher
        Parameters:
        suggestMatcher - matcher that determines if a data word may be suggested for the current search word.
